description: This file contains security-related functions for authentication and authorization, including password hashing, JWT creation, token validation, and user retrieval within a FastAPI application.

methods.name: str _jwt_secret()
methods.description: Retrieves the JWT secret from environment variables, with a fallback for development.

methods.name: str _jwt_algorithm()
methods.description: Retrieves the JWT algorithm from environment variables, defaults to HS256.

methods.name: int _jwt_expiration_minutes()
methods.description: Retrieves token expiration time in minutes from environment variables, defaults to 60.

methods.name: str hash_password(password: str)
methods.description: Hashes a plaintext password using bcrypt.

methods.name: bool verify_password(plain_password: str, password_hash: str | None)
methods.description: Verifies a plaintext password against a stored hash.

methods.name: str create_access_token(subject: str | int, expires_delta: Optional[timedelta] = None, extra_claims: Optional[dict] = None)
methods.description: Creates a signed JWT token with optional expiration and additional claims.

methods.name: User get_current_user( credentials: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials | None = Depends(_http_bearer), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: FastAPI dependency to authenticate and retrieve the current user based on Bearer token.
